Data: Razzak to Ponting, 1 run flicked towards square leg for a single
Razzak to Watson, 1 run full on leg stump, whipped away on front of square
Razzak to Ponting, no run much better line, what is the need for all this darts outside leg, when you can toss them up a tad on middle,and get the batsman to defend with pad close together
Razzak to Ponting, no run pushed on the leg side, Razzak fields
Razzak to Ponting, 1 run lunges forward and pushes towards covers for the single
Razzak to Watson, no run misses the flick, off the pads towards short fine leg
Shuvo to Ponting, no run gets way forward and defends earnestly down the track

Shuvo to Ponting, 2 runs, OUT well, well, you don't see that very often, Ponting is run out by a relay throw from the keeper, he was playing so well, it was swept backward of square, and had almost crossed the ropes but Shafiul running in from deep midwicket just
Shuvo to Watson, 1 run worked away in front of square and that brings the Australia captain on strike
Shuvo to Clarke, 1 wide bowled slower through the air, but down the leg side
Shuvo to Clarke, 1 run worked backward of square, direct hit at the non-striker's but Clarke is well home
Shuvo to Watson, 1 run full on leg stump, and easily worked away through midwicket
Shuvo to Clarke, no run leaves the crease, but gets too close to the ball and pushes it on the leg side
Shakib to Watson, 1 run shortish to begin with on the pads, whipped through midwicket
Shakib to Clarke, no run tossed up outside off stump, comes forward and defends
Shakib to Clarke, no run again Clarke leaves his crease, Shakib fired it in and Clarke could only push it to midwicket
Shakib to Clarke, no run ooh, this one kept very low, Clarke fortunately managed to get down his bat on it else it was headed for the stumps
Shakib to Clarke, FOUR runs drops this one short, and Clarke is waiting, rocks on the back foot and pulls it along the ground to the deep midwicket boundary
Shakib to Clarke, no run punched off the back foot on the off side
Razzak to Watson, no run too close for the cut, but Watson plays the shot nevertheless, gets it to short third man

Razzak to Watson, OUT Razzak goes up in a fervent and long-drawn appeal, ultimately gets the decision in his favour, Watson was pushing forward, playing for the turn, there hasn't been much of it today, this one went straight on, struck him on the pad, in line wit
Razzak to White, no run pushed in to the leg side off the front foot
Razzak to White, no run carefully patted away towards midwicket
Razzak to White, no run tossed up on middle stump, White reins himself in and pushes it out to mid off
Razzak to White, 1 run gets off the mark with a single towards square leg
Shakib to White, 1 run Clarke wants the single, White doesn't as he pushes one in the air on the leg side, the overthrow fetches them the run in the end
Shakib to Clarke, no run down the track comes Clarke, but is nowhere near the line of the ball, and takes it on the pads
Shakib to Clarke, 1 run this time he connects with the flick and gets it wide of midwicket
Shakib to White, no run deadbatted resolutely by White off the front foot
Shakib to White, no run much fuller on the stumps, pushed back to the bowler
Shakib to White, no run bowled slower through the air outside off stump, pushed away towards covers, White is eager, Clarke is not, Clarke is right
Razzak to Clarke, no run fired in flat on middle, pushed back to the bowler
Razzak to Clarke, 1 run Clarke uses the feet and picks the single to long on
Razzak to White, no run lunges forward and defends down the track
Razzak to White, no run very tight line this, White defends off he front foot
Razzak to White, no run still flatter, this time outside off, pushed away on the off side
Razzak to White, no run Bangladesh continue to race through the overs, this one loops in the air on the leg side as White pushes hard at it
Shakib to Clarke, no run Clarke continues to operate outside the crease, but finds Shuvo in the way at extra cover
Shakib to Clarke, no run and again, drives from way down the track, but straight to the bowler
Shakib to Clarke, no run leaves the crease again, this one arrives after ages, he stands motionless and then punches it towards covers
Shakib to Clarke, 1 run on the fourth attempt, he gets the single with a shimmy down the track and a drive to long off
Shakib to White, no run played out off the front foot towards covers
Shakib to White, no run gets forward and defends, no intent at all from White, except the one of obdurate survival
Razzak to Clarke, no run goes back in the crease and takes it off middle stump to cut it to cover

Razzak to Clarke, 1 leg bye is there a run, now they think there is, now they think there isn't, then they repeat the muddled thought process again, and decide to attempt suicide in the end, Shuvo it is who races in from point and lobs in the underarm throw to M
Razzak to White, no run pushed back down the track

Razzak to White, no run White can't buy a run, can he survive at least, it was tossed up a tad and he wanted to launch it over midwicket, in the form he is in, that was pushing his luck, took it on the pad, bowler thinks that's a goner, but umpire says it's going
Razzak to White, 1 run does a Clarke, shimmies down the track and takes the single to long on
Razzak to Clarke, no run Clarkes carries on with all that scurrying down the pitch, but pushes this one to mid on
Shakib to White, no run leaves the crease and then tries to dead bat this one, off the pad and loops in the air on the leg side
Shakib to White, no run played out down the track
Shakib to White, no run again he takes it on the pads as he pushes forward
Shakib to White, 1 run this time he manages to get the single to long on
Shakib to Clarke, 1 run the shimmy and the single after the bowler fails to field the ball cleanly
Shakib to White, 1 run languid and calm push off the front foot that beats a diving bowler and earns him a single to long off, brings up the 100
Razzak to White, 1 run flicked from two steps down the track and wide of midwicket
Razzak to Clarke, FOUR runs similar shot, but Clarke is in much better form, times the flick so deftly that it easily beats mid on and runs for four to his right
Razzak to Clarke, no run shout for lbw as he backs away for the cut to a ball on the stumps, not given, was it bat first, or pad first?
Razzak to Clarke, no run played out on the leg side
Razzak to Clarke, 1 leg bye tentative from the batsman, but he picks up the run as the ball rolls behind point
Razzak to White, no run pushed back to the bowler
Shakib to Clarke, no run punched back to the bowler off the back foot
Shakib to Clarke, 1 run worked away off the pads through square leg, they want the second, but settle for the single
Shakib to White, no run takes some time to determine what to do with this one on the stumps, and defends it in the end

Shakib to White, FOUR runs White has a boundary, he has a boundary, comes down the track, is not too close to the pitch, but nevertheless swings through the line and the ball rolls in to the long on boundary
Shakib to White, no run tries to repeat the shot, this one is much flatter and he pushes on the leg side
Shakib to White, no run pushes this one back to the bowler
Shuvo to Clarke, 1 run goes deep in the crease to work the single to square leg
Shuvo to White, no run Shuvo belts out the appeal, he struck the batsman on the pads even as he looked to sweep, struck around off stump, not given, was there some bat?
Shuvo to White, 1 run gets the single this time and gets off strike
Shuvo to Clarke, no run hits him on the pads and rolls away down the leg side as he offers no shot
Shuvo to Clarke, 1 run pushed to mid on and they go through for the single, comfortably, in the end
Shuvo to White, 1 run driven down the ground to long off
Shakib to White, no run leaves the crease but is cramped for room and has to push the ball on the leg side
Shakib to White, no run punched to extra cover off the back foot
Shakib to White, no run comes down the track again, but can only push it away towards midwicket
Shakib to White, no run pushed down the track off the front foot
Shakib to White, 1 run finally, finally he gets the single to long on
Shakib to Clarke, 1 run punched off the back foot for a run down the ground
Shuvo to Clarke, no run slapped away but straight to extra cover
Shuvo to Clarke, 1 run shuffles and whips backward of square leg
Shuvo to White, 1 run White escapes, went for the sweep, has got him on trouble each time, this time he connects and it loops weakly in the air but falls short of fine leg
Shuvo to Clarke, 1 run Clarke goes back and punches a flat delivery to long off
Shuvo to White, no run comes down the pitch but gets in to a tangle to defend it on the leg side in the end
Shuvo to White, no run this one is much fuller, played out to the bowler
Shafiul to Clarke, no run lunges forward and pushes a length ball to extra cover, lots of men in the ring
Shafiul to Clarke, no run beaten outside off, went for an aggressive drive from the crease, and missed
Shafiul to Clarke, no run shuffles across and plays out this one with the angle to mid on
Shafiul to Clarke, 1 run goes hard at this one full outside off stump, and gets it off the edge to third man
Shafiul to White, 1 run goes for the hook, it was a nasty bouncer, and he managed to get it away in the air towards square leg, and even completed the risky run safely in the end
Shafiul to Clarke, no run played back to the bowler, excellent over from Shafiul
Shuvo to White, 1 run pushed off the front foot past the diving bowler and away to long on
Shuvo to Clarke, FOUR runs Clarke continues to collect runs from way down the track, gets to the pitch and hits this one across the line and gets it in the gap between midwicket and mid on
Shuvo to Clarke, no run he has hardly played from the crease against the spinners, finds mid on this time
Shuvo to Clarke, no run this time he drives back to the bowler
Shuvo to Clarke, 1 run angles this on the pads, he skips out and flicks backward of square
Shuvo to White, 1 run sweeps from outside off stump, and gets it to the right of fine leg
Shafiul to White, 1 run calm push down to long on for a single off a length ball
Shafiul to Clarke, no run plonks front foot out and gets bat around it to play this one to midwicket
Shafiul to Clarke, 1 run too full and on the pads, flicked stylishly to deep midwicket
Shafiul to White, no run this one is outside off stump, and he waits for it to come on and pushes out to extra cover

Shafiul to White, 1 run dropped as they say, straight in, and straight out, even when White manages to middle them, they seem to find the fielders, he swatted the pull straight to midwicket, it went as waist height to him, and he dropped it
Shafiul to Clarke, no run pushed out in to the off side
Shuvo to White, 1 run down the track and gets the single to long on
Shuvo to Clarke, no run some confusion as White runs halfway down the pitch as this one is pushed to mid on, but makes it back in time
Shuvo to Clarke, FOUR runs calmly done, takes two steps to the pitch of the ball and hammers it over midwicket
Shuvo to Clarke, no run White is in a tearing hurry for the single, again he is halfway down the pitch before being sent back
Shuvo to Clarke, 1 run this time they get the single, worked away backward of square leg
Shuvo to White, no run now White leaves the crease but only manages to push out to midwicket
Shafiul to Clarke, no run midwicket cuts off the single to his left as Clarke whips a back of a length ball
Shafiul to Clarke, no run good short ball, gets big on Clarke, who pulls out of the er, pull in the end
Shafiul to Clarke, no run targets the stumps with the length ball, he cannot get the whip past midwicket
Shafiul to Clarke, no run 115.3 kph slower one, cuts back in outside off, he guides it to point
Shafiul to Clarke, no run 119.4 kph and keeping low outside off stump, watchfully patted back to the bowler
Shafiul to Clarke, no run 114.8 kph and very full outside off stump, dug out to extra cover, lovely bowling from Shafiul, first maiden of the game
Shuvo to White, no run eased to extra cover off the front foot
Shuvo to White, no run now he comes down the track but drives to extra cover again

Shuvo to White, OUT Imrul puts White out of his misery, he came charging down the track, did not get to the pitch of the ball, and went through with the shot half-heartedly, just managing to chip it in the air, he grimaced right away knowing he was in trouble, Imr

Shuvo to Clarke, 1 run Clarke lives on, Australia almost could have lost another, went for the single as Shuvo failed to collect the drive cleanly, there was a direct hit at the non-striker's but replays confirm that Clarke was well in
Shuvo to Hussey, no run tossed up outside off stump and pushed off the front foot
Shuvo to Hussey, 1 run Mike is away, driving with the turn to long on
Shuvo to Clarke, 3 runs
Mahmudullah to Clarke, no run whips the shortish one but Shuvo dives and stops the ball at midwicket
Mahmudullah to Clarke, 1 run eased down the ground with the turn to long on
Mahmudullah to Hussey, no run loops in the air off the pads as he misses on the nudge to midwicket
Mahmudullah to Hussey, no run pushed away towards covers off the front foot
Mahmudullah to Hussey, 1 run they take on Shuvo with the push to extra cover, direct hit at the striker
Mahmudullah to Clarke, 1 run down the track and driven to the bowler who fails to stop the ball and concedes the run
Mortaza to Clarke, 1 leg bye slung in from a length down the leg side, off the pads and they go swap ends
Mortaza to Hussey, no run tight stuff around the off stump, he looks to squirt it wide of point but cannot beat the man
Mortaza to Hussey, no run right on the stumps off a length, shuffles and defends off the front foot
Mortaza to Hussey, no run spirits out and drives the fuller one confidently but right to extra cover
Mortaza to Hussey, 1 run worked off the pads through square leg, good over from Mash so far
Mortaza to Clarke, 1 run angled in on leg stump from short of a length and turned past midwicket
Mahmudullah to Clarke, 1 run short ball, he goes back and punches past midwicket to wide of long on
Mahmudullah to Hussey, no run tossed up from round the wicket, defended carefully
Mahmudullah to Hussey, 1 run clipped off the toes to deep midwicket, goes quickly to the man and they abandon all thoughts of the second run
Mahmudullah to Clarke, 1 run comes down the track, shoes the full face of the blade and collects a run to long on
Mahmudullah to Hussey, no run cramped for room with one fired straight in and played out to midwicket
Mahmudullah to Hussey, 1 run Australia continue to attempt those tight singles, this one was cut to cover and Hussey put in the full-length dive but a direct hit and he would have struggled
Mortaza to Hussey, no run Mash continues to operate on a tight line around off stump, and he pushes this one down the track
Mortaza to Hussey, 1 run right on the money again, he remains in the crease and gets an inside edge in front of square leg

Mortaza to Clarke, 2 runs much fuller this time and he eases it past the non-striker, long on is a bit wide and they jog through for the second, that has to be the most comfortable couple ever taken down the ground
Mortaza to Clarke, no run Clarkes gets forward and whips the extra cover drive but mid off runs to his left and cuts it off
Mortaza to Clarke, 1 run pushed away for a single towards mid on this time
Mortaza to Hussey, 2 runs another comfortable couple this time off the whip backward of square leg
Mahmudullah to Clarke, 1 run that one's been worked away through square leg for a single, they thought of a second but Hussey was sent back
Mahmudullah to Hussey, no run slightly short on the off, rocks back and punches it to midwicket
Mahmudullah to Hussey, no run angling in towards middle, worked away towards square leg
Mahmudullah to Hussey, 1 run cracked off the back foot past extra cover into the deep for a single
Mahmudullah to Clarke, 1 run tossed up on the off, comes down the track and drives it hard back to the bowler who fumbles and allows them a single
Mahmudullah to Hussey, no run looping in towards off, gets forward and defends it to point
Mortaza to Clarke, no run good length on middle, drives it firmly but straight back to the bowler
Mortaza to Clarke, 2 runs slightly short outside off, cracked off the back foot wide of deep extra cover for a couple of runs
Mortaza to Clarke, 2 runs gets a thick outside edge, tried to push it through the line but it rose up to move away a hint, gets it past a diving point for a single, he's on 49 now
Mortaza to Clarke, no run short of a good length on middle, rocks back and punches it to midwicket
Mortaza to Clarke, 2 runs slower one bowled short outside off, slaps it past point for a couple of runs, raises his half-century, good start to his stint as full-time captain
Mortaza to Clarke, no run gets forward and pushes it back to the bowler, firmly
Mahmudullah to Hussey, 1 run darted straight in with the angle from round the wicket, turned wide of mid on
Mahmudullah to Clarke, 1 run continues round the wicket to clarke who flicks through midwicket
Mahmudullah to Hussey, 1 run goes back in the crease to work this one off the pads behind square leg
Mahmudullah to Clarke, no run tossed up across Clarke from round the wicket, defended off the front foot
Mahmudullah to Clarke, 1 run length ball staying low on the pads, nudged through square leg
Mahmudullah to Hussey, 1 run punched off the back foot, Mahmudullah hurries to his right but cannot stop the ball
Shakib to Hussey, 1 run turned off the back foot in front of square leg
Shakib to Clarke, 1 run goes straight on with the arm on leg stump, worked away to short fine leg
Shakib to Hussey, no run leaves the crease but is cramped for room, and plays it out to short fine leg in the end
Shakib to Hussey, no run fired in on the pads, that is how you bowl to your field, turned right to short fine leg
Shakib to Hussey, no run lovely bowling, another dot ball, Hussey is forced to play on the leg side with this line from round the stumps
Shakib to Hussey, 1 run this time he goes deep in the crease to punch a shortish one to long on, end of an excellent over from the captain
Razzak to Hussey, 1 run turned backward of square leg, Razzak starts off well

Razzak to Clarke, FOUR runs short and Clarke will not fail to latch on to those, a fine player of spin is he, rocks back and pulls it over midwicket, wide of the man on the boundary, a four after 63 deliveries says Ranil Abeynaike
Razzak to Clarke, no run pushed back to the bowler
Razzak to Clarke, no run keeps very low on middle stump, he was fortunate to get some bat on it as he went on the back foot
Razzak to Clarke, 1 run down the track and picks up the single to long on
Razzak to Hussey, 1 run this time Hussey gets the run down the ground, Razzak cannot stop the ball to his left
Shakib to Hussey, no run gets a leading edge down the track as he looks to whip this one off the pads
Shakib to Hussey, no run Shakib goes down on one knee and appeals, implores, cajoles the umpire, but Hussey was struck about a foot outside off on his failed attempt to sweep
Shakib to Hussey, no run was that off the bat, off the thigh pad, took something as it was darted down the leg side, Mushfiqur could not take it cleanly as he went down on the ground
Shakib to Hussey, no run turned to short fine leg off the back foot, these batting Powerplays I tell you, I just feel for the batting side
Shakib to Hussey, 1 run eases forward to pick up the single wide of extra cover
Shakib to Clarke, 1 run leaves the crease and drives the full delivery for the single to long on
Razzak to Clarke, FOUR runs this is more like a Powerplay. Clarke comes down the track, makes some room outside leg stump, and lofts with the turn over covers
Razzak to Clarke, 1 run stays rooted on the crease and nudges wide of short fine leg
Razzak to Hussey, 1 run this time Hussey leaves the crease but gets too close to the ball, digs it out down the ground in the end
Razzak to Clarke, no run worked away off the hip to short fine leg
Razzak to Clarke, 1 run easy on the eye, economy of effort, lots of intent, captain Clarke shimmies and eases the ball to long on for the single
Razzak to Hussey, no run rock-solid Mike defends from the crease on the off side
Shakib to Clarke, 1 run punched down the ground off the back foot
Shakib to Hussey, 1 run swept away from outside leg stump to deep backward square leg
Shakib to Clarke, 1 wide darted in wide down the leg side, no turn at all
Shakib to Clarke, 1 run how many times has he done this, leaves the crease and drives down to long on
Shakib to Hussey, 2 runs Mike opens the face at the last instant to run this one outside off wide of Tamim at third man
Shakib to Hussey, 1 run turned to deep midwicket off the back foot
Shakib to Clarke, 1 run brings up the 200 with a skip down the track and a flick to short fine leg
Razzak to Clarke, 1 run tossed up on middle and leg, hustled down the ground to long on
Razzak to Hussey, 1 run swept down to fine leg for a single
Razzak to Clarke, 1 run full delivery, flicked wide of long on for a single
Razzak to Hussey, 1 run guided to point almost from off stump and Clarke hurries across
Razzak to Clarke, SIX runs Clarke takes off, tossed up on leg stump, and he went down on the knee right away, and slogged it over deep midwicket
Razzak to Clarke, no run still fuller this time, turned straight to Shuvo at midwicket
Shakib to Hussey, no run goes for the reverse sweep now, but right to short third man, or short fine leg, or take your pick
Shakib to Hussey, 1 run pushed in front of covers, another one keeps very low outside off
Shakib to Clarke, no run down the track but pushes straight to the bowler
Shakib to Clarke, no run yet another one does not get up, short and wide, but he could not time the cut because of the low bounce
Shakib to Clarke, 1 run hurries down the track and gets the single to long off
Shakib to Hussey, 1 run turned away to square leg for a single
Shafiul to Hussey, 2 runs starts off with a wide and full delivery that is squeezed out to point who dives and cuts off the boundary but Mike comes back for the second, what a man
Shafiul to Hussey, FOUR runs this time he gets the boundary, charges out and looks to go down the ground, off the edge and wide of third man
Shafiul to Hussey, no run 111 kph slower one on the stumps, stays in the crease and punches it to extra cover

Shafiul to Hussey, no run Shafiul gets this one very full and cramps him for room, he digs it out to the bowler, who dives and fields, and then tries a feeble reverse flick of a throw that misses the stumps by about 15 feet, Mushfiqur manages to take the ball
Shafiul to Hussey, 1 run another full delivery, slapped away down the ground
Shafiul to Clarke, 2 runs Clarke backs away and swings hard at a short delivery that gets big on him, gets it wide of long on for a couple

Shuvo to Hussey, OUT Hussey finds long off with precision, got too close to the pitch of the delivery as he skipped down the track, long off had positioned himself nicely under the ball as it came down safely in his hands, big wicket
Shuvo to Clarke, 1 run
Shuvo to Smith, 1 run well, this has been the Australian approach today, play the spinners from down the track, Smith does that and flicks through square leg
Shuvo to Clarke, 1 run scurries down the track and gets the single down the ground
Shuvo to Smith, no run too close for the cut shot, but Smith does so nevertheless, does not get it past point, Clarke wants the single and has to be sent back from midway down the pitch
Shuvo to Smith, OUT heave-ho, and clatter, Smith goes for the big one over midwicket, misses the ball that does not turn, and off stump is rattled, Mushfiqur likes it
Shafiul to Clarke, 1 run follow him with a full delivery outside leg stump, he hits it away to midwicket
Shafiul to Johnson, no run played out in front of covers off the back foot
Shafiul to Johnson, 1 run played wide of midwicket and they take on Shakib, he goes for the throw at the striker
Shafiul to Clarke, 1 run 103.7 kph slower one, and very full, picked away through midwicket, cannot get much power on the shot
Shafiul to Johnson, 1 run yorker on the stumps, digs it out and gets it wide of Shakib at midwicket who tumbles down as he picks up the ball, and they complete the run

Shafiul to Clarke, 3 runs dropped makes some room outside leg and hammers a full and wide one, it flies to point who goes leaping in the air to his left, gets a hand to it, but cannot hold on, tough chance
Mortaza to Clarke, 1 run full and outside off stump, he slaps it down to long off
Mortaza to Johnson, no run Mitch with the perfect tee-off pose, front leg out of the way, huge golf swing, even bigger follow through, but the ball barely missed the stumps
Mortaza to Johnson, 1 run slower one and fuller, heaved away to deep midwicket
Mortaza to Clarke, 2 runs in the slot outside off stump, Clarke swings it down the ground and picks up two more
Mortaza to Clarke, 2 runs and again, this time he moves around in the crease before slamming a fuller one down the ground for a couple more
Mortaza to Clarke, 1 run driven down to long on for a single, and Clarke will keep the strike
Shafiul to Clarke, 1 run Clarke is battering them now, another full delivery hit down to long off
Shafiul to Johnson, 2 runs Mitch tries to tee off again, but gets a big inside edge that beats the stumps, beats the keeper, and makes short fine leg give chase

Shafiul to Johnson, no run had Shafiul fielded that ball cleanly, Clarke was a goner, he was backing up way down the pitch, Mitch again tried to swing over midwicket but it is not coming on to the bat to his liking
Shafiul to Johnson, SIX runs well, what do I know, this time he connects, bends the knee, picks the length ball up, and murders it over deep midwicket
Shafiul to Johnson, no run wide full delivery, he missed out on that one, got an edge on the bounce to the keeper
Shafiul to Johnson, FOUR runs super placement from Mitch, drives neatly wide of extra cover and beats long off too
Mortaza to Clarke, 1 run wide delivery, too wide for Clarke who had to really stretch out to slap that one wide of extra cover, did not get enough power on it, can he get his 100?
Mortaza to Johnson, FOUR runs poor delivery, low full toss down the pads, and Mitch nudges very delicately, as delicate as Mitch can, and gets it wide of Mushfiqur
Mortaza to Johnson, 1 run attempted yorker turns in to a very low full toss, turned away through midwicket

Mortaza to Clarke, SIX runs Michael Clarke, gets the hundred, takes off the helmet, punches the air, it was a short delivery, and he absolutely smoked it over deep midwicket, his team stand up to applaud, lovely innings
Mortaza to Clarke, OUT now he is gone, got underneath the fuller one and swung it high in the air, long on settled underneath it, and took it tumbling down in the end
Mortaza to Johnson, SIX runs waist high full toss to end with, and Mitch kills it over deep square leg, just flicked it off the hip and away she went, the last two overs have cost Bangladesh dear

Shakib was miserly with the ball, but was let down by his other bowlers, especially the spinners who overdid the leg stump line, allowing easy singles. This will be a difficult chase, join us in some time.

Michael Clarke will be proud of his batting performance in his first match as official captain. It was a difficult pitch to bat on, but he went about his task serenely, using his feet almost each time to the spinners. Ricky Ponting looked in supreme touch as he got going
Welcome back for Bangladesh's chase, Tamim and Imrul will start off. Michael Clarke is feeling the new ball vigorously in his hands, it will be Brett Lee with the new ball, in his 200th ODI
Lee to Tamim, no run 135.7 kph straightens outside off stump, he had already decided to leave it alone, wasn't far from off in the end
Lee to Tamim, 1 run length ball comes in and ends up on the pads, clipped away neatly down to fine leg, huge cheers for the run
Lee to Imrul, no run another one nips back in off the seam, bounces high and hits him on the body as he misses the defensive push
Lee to Imrul, no run 141.9 kph, Lee is cranking it up slowly, digs this one in short, does not get up much but flies past him outside off stump as he weaves out of the way
Lee to Imrul, FOUR runs just over a leaping point, Lee sprayed this one wide outside off, he went hard at it and got it over the man at point
Lee to Imrul, no run stays in the crease and goes for the drive, beaten as this length ball whizzes past outside off
Johnson to Tamim, no run slung in on the stumps at 137.3 kph, defended carefully
Johnson to Tamim, no run this one zips away after pitching on a length on off stump, he goes back to play it out to covers
Johnson to Tamim, 1 run looks for the yorker, but it ends up very full on the pads, flicked away through square leg
Johnson to Imrul, no run gets this one on target, and gets it to move away off the seam, he gets back to push to covers
Johnson to Imrul, no run good leave, Mitch is getting them to move away from the left-hander, and he let this one outside off go through to Haddin
Johnson to Imrul, no run 137.4 kph yorker zooming in on the stumps, bang on target, he manages to survive, digs it out on the leg side
Lee to Tamim, no run full delivery around off stump, driven towards mid off
Lee to Tamim, no run length ball outside off stump, left alone
Lee to Tamim, 1 run angles this one in from round the wicket, he gets an inside edge towards midwicket
Lee to Imrul, no run very full outside off stump, there is a short extra cover in place and it goes straight to him
Lee to Imrul, 1 wide short and wide outside off stump, he goes for the cut and misses
Lee to Imrul, no run this one is fuller outside off stump and left alone
Johnson to Tamim, no run slapped away off the back foot, but straight to extra cover
Johnson to Tamim, no run banged in short around off stump, he goes on his toes to fend it down
Johnson to Tamim, no run pushed away in to covers off the front foot
Johnson to Tamim, 1 run full delivery on the pads, turned away in front of square leg

Johnson to Nafees, OUT Mitch gets one now, Nafees had that front foot planted a long way across the stumps, by the times he tried to get the bat around to the full delivery, the ball had already crashed in to pad, Mitch surprisingly went up in an half-hearted appea
Johnson to Raqibul, no run ends the over with one angling across from back of a length. Defended from the crease to the off side
Lee to Tamim, FOUR runs ka-boom. Tamim's drilled Lee on the up through wide mid off. Corker of a shot, it was a foot and a half outside off, he got half across and slammed it through the line.
Lee to Tamim, no run better length and line, Lee angles it in closer and holds the length back. Tamim lets it go outside off.
Lee to Tamim, 1 run this time he gets too straight, angling into the pads and clipped square for a single.
Lee to Raqibul, no run short ball, lifter outside off and Raqibul gingerly sways away
Lee to Raqibul, 1 run over-pitched outside off at 140 kph, Raqibul tries to play the square drive, but is a trifle late on the shot. Single to third man.
Lee to Tamim, no run poor ball, but he gets away with it. Bouncer angling into the hips and it is pulled away well, but straight to short fine leg
Johnson to Raqibul, 1 run pacy offcutter angling across, Raqibul stays on the crease and steers backward of point
Johnson to Tamim, no run Tamim's looking good. Back of a length and not too wide outside off, but Tamim generates tremendous power on the pick-up cover drive. He finds the fielder though.
Johnson to Tamim, no run good response, bouncer like he means it and gunning for Tamim's head. He wisely sways out of the way.
Johnson to Tamim, no run throws his bat at this one, another delivery close to off stump and not there for the drive. Tamim can't heave it away.
Johnson to Tamim, no run fuller ball, swerving into the pads, driven solidly to mid on
Johnson to Tamim, no run this one comes off slower than Tamim expected and he mistimes the off drive to Clarke, trotting to his right at mid off.
Lee to Raqibul, no run tucks him up with pace, Raqibul hangs back in the crease and defends.
Lee to Raqibul, no run fuller this time, Raqibul tries to lean into a cover drive but finds the fielder
Lee to Raqibul, 1 run aha, inside edge. Cuts in from outside off as he goes for a cover drive and gets the lemon cut away to fine leg.
Lee to Tamim, FOUR runs Tamim slams another four, anything in his half will go, almost like a yard sale. Steps up to the pitch and bashes it over mid on, on the up.
Lee to Tamim, 1 run short of length, angled into the hips, Tamim hops onto the back foot and whips to square leg.
Lee to Raqibul, no run Raqibul defends the last ball, back of a length and played back down the track
Johnson to Tamim, 1 wide angling down the leg side and called a wide.
Johnson to Tamim, no run fuller from Mitch, he gets it to curve away nicely and Tamim ends up getting a thick edge on his cover drive, straight to point
Johnson to Tamim, 2 runs neatly done. Mitch sprays a half volley at his ankle, Tamim skips inside the line and clips it backward of square leg
Johnson to Tamim, no run this time he bangs it short of a length and gets it to move away, Tamim looks to crack the cut but finds cover
Johnson to Tamim, 1 wide another one down the leg side. Classic Mitch, this over. Even he can't predict where the next ball will go.
Johnson to Tamim, 1 run offcutter ends up on the pads and Tamim again clips it through square leg for one.
Johnson to Raqibul, no run ah, Raqibul gets some pad on what would have been a wide down the leg side.
Johnson to Raqibul, no run stop the press. The over is over. Offcutter on middle, played carefully into the off side.
Hastings to Tamim, no run angles this one across the batsman from a length, there is lots of room for the cut, but Tamim swings from the crease and is beaten
Hastings to Tamim, no run this time he gets forward neatly and drives delicately to extra cover
Hastings to Tamim, 1 run fuller from Hastings, he spirits forward to push it wide of Clarke at mid off who has a shy at the stumps and misses
Hastings to Raqibul, no run belts a full delivery off the front foot but the gaps seem to have disappeared completely, this time it is mid on who fields
Hastings to Raqibul, no run forcing punchy shot off a length ball but again right to extra cover
Hastings to Raqibul, no run he drags this one back of a length and Raqibul waits for it to come on and guides it towards point
Watson to Tamim, 2 runs looks to loft him down the ground in expansive fashion from way outside off stump, gets it off the toe end high over the bowler's head, but it falls inside the circle

Watson to Tamim, FOUR runs that is disdainful and dangerous from Tamim, Watson gave him width and he punched it in the air, just about managing to beat extra cover who leaped in the air but to no avail
Watson to Tamim, no run and right away, the different angle cramps him for room and he is content to push it away
Watson to Tamim, no run angles it further in to the batsman, this time short of a length, and he tucks it away to midwicket
Watson to Tamim, no run Tamim is wiser to this angle now, this one is around off stump, and he makes some room to steer it, but third man is up in the circle and cuts it off
Watson to Tamim, 1 run this one nipped back in with the angle, and Tamim took it high on the pad as he missed it, but they steal a leg bye

Hastings to Tamim, no run too close for the cut shot, angled across the batsman but Tamim has a go, misses, Hastings is interested for the caught behind, so is Haddin, the umpire is not convinced, Haddin gives Tamim a mouthful
Hastings to Tamim, 1 run chopped down to third man
Hastings to Raqibul, no run lets the length ball come on to him and pushes it out to point
Hastings to Raqibul, no run guided towards point off the back foot

Hastings to Raqibul, no run cut away to point, Raqibul is going nowhere at the moment
Hastings to Raqibul, no run comes forward for the cover drive, but it rolls away close to the crease off an inside edge
Watson to Tamim, no run lovely delivery, angles this one on for the drive, Tamim comes out and tries to, but it zips away at the last instant, and beats him
Watson to Tamim, no run pushed out towards point from the crease
Watson to Tamim, FOUR runs this time he gets one away, poor delivery down the pads and he tickles it past short fine leg, that gets the crowd going again
Watson to Tamim, no run Watsone sprays this one full on the pads again, lucky not to be dispatched past short fine leg
Watson to Tamim, no run pushed out to covers off the front foot, better line from Watto

Watson to Tamim, no run comes down the track for his favourite lofted shot down the ground, but Watson angles it in from a shorter length, and Tamim has to play it out back to Watson who threatens to break the stumps
Hastings to Raqibul, no run defended in to the leg side
Hastings to Raqibul, no run this is not Raqibul's day, he pings a god looking cover drive, but it goes straight to the fielder, on another day that would have crashed in to the boundary
Hastings to Raqibul, no run this one is just around a length outside off, he gets forward hopefully but punches it straight to mid off
Hastings to Raqibul, FOUR runs this time he gets one away, it was a poorly directed short ball down the leg side and he pulled it on its way to the fine leg boundary

Hastings to Raqibul, OUT Watto, what a man, goes diving to his left at short extra cover as Raqibul drives in the air away from his body, and comes down on terra firma with the ball safely lodged in his hands, Raqibul's painful stay is cut short by a blinder, wond
Hastings to Shakib, no run shuffles and carefully plays out a length ball bowled from round the stumps towards midwicket
Watson to Tamim, 1 run goes slashing hard at a wide one outside off stump, and gets it down to third man off the thick edge
Watson to Shakib, no run turned away towards square leg
Watson to Shakib, no run pushed away in to the off side off the back foot
Watson to Shakib, no run stands in the crease and cuts, but right to point, steady stuff from the bowler
Watson to Shakib, no run bowled a bit further up around off, and he pushes it to CLarke at mid off
Watson to Shakib, 1 run ooh, that was close, Shakib wasn't expecting the fuller one and almost fell over in his attempt to flick it, got it just past midwicket

Hastings to Shakib, FOUR runs super shot from Shakib, gets on top of the bounce on this delivery outside off, it cut back in a tad but he was in a lovely position, cut it past a helpless point, and though Lee gave earnest chase from third man, it was too quick for
Hastings to Shakib, no run shuffles across in the crease and plays out this one to mid on
Hastings to Shakib, no run bit more effort in this one, bounces a bit on Shakib and he shuffles across to defend
Hastings to Shakib, no run fuller this time and on off stump, he drives back to the bowler with the full face of the bat
Hastings to Shakib, no run stays on the back foot and gets in some discomfort as this one cuts back in and keeps low, manages to jam down his bat on it

Doherty to Tamim, no run sharp turn even as he backed away for the cut, stayed low too outside off and beat him

Doherty to Tamim, no run good over so far, punched towards extra cover
Doherty to Tamim, no run starts off with a maiden as this one is played out on the off side
Hastings to Shakib, FOUR runs flicked away fine down the leg side, poor ball on the pads, and put away
Hastings to Shakib, no run this one did not get up at all, fortunately for Shakib it was outside off stump, had him crouching down as he was beaten by the lack of bounce
Hastings to Shakib, no run shuffles across to flick a fuller one through square leg but cannot time it

Hastings to Shakib, no run another one darted in down the leg side, not called a wide, did it take the thigh pad on its way to Haddin, bowler and keeper think there is bat involved, well don't they always?

Doherty to Tamim, 1 run full ball swept away to deep square leg

Doherty to Shakib, no run tossed up outside off this time, he takes it on the half volley to drive it to extra cover

Lee to Tamim, no run fuller delivery, calmly defended down the track
Lee to Tamim, no run squeezes away a fuller one to point but there is no run available

Johnson to Shakib, no run makes a belated decision to drive this length ball, hits it back in the ground and to Mitch
Johnson to Shakib, 1 run shatters the non-striker's stumps with the straightest of straight drives, and the ball rolls away towards extra cover

Watson to Mushfiqur, no run goes for the cut to a delivery close to off stump, and misses it completely
Watson to Mushfiqur, 1 run cramps him for room with a length ball angled in and he tucks it in front of square, direct hit and he was gone
Watson to Mahmudullah, 1 run whipped away off the back foot, this one did not rise much but he adjusted well in the end
Watson to Mushfiqur, FOUR runs Mush makes room and mows this one over mid on, just backed away and flat-batted it
Watson to Mushfiqur, 1 run goes back in the crease to turn this one in front of midwicket and the way they ran that single with a fervent urgency, you'd believe the chase was still on
Smith to Mushfiqur, 1 run tossed up ball, lofted down the ground to long off
Smith to Mahmudullah, 1 run stays in the crease and hammers a flighted full delivery to sweeper cover
Smith to Mushfiqur, 2 runs slogged away to deep midwicket
Smith to Mushfiqur, 1 run backs away and cuts this one turning away to sweeper cover
Smith to Mahmudullah, SIX runs swatted over mid on, it was tossed up and he helped himself to an almighty heave
Smith to Mahmudullah, 1 run tossed up delivery played out in front of covers, and that will be the end of this 'chase'

So Michael Clarke has a comprehensive win in his first win as official Australia captain. Bangladesh never attempted to go for the target after losing a couple of early wickets, and just went through the motions of playing out the 50 overs.
Hang on for the presentation, folks.
That will be all from us for this game. You can catch all the action from the IPL here. This is Abhishek Purohit signing off along with Gopi Rangarajan. Cheers.
Australia won by 60 runs
Player of the match is Michael Clarke, AUS
